name: bga-chrome-extension
description: Watch your games in progress on boardgamearena.com ... and lots of visual improvements!

scripts.build: yarn clean && NODE_ENV=production yarn prod:css && yarn prod:parcel
scripts.build:ff: yarn clean && NODE_ENV=production yarn prod:css && yarn prebuild:firefox && yarn prod:parcel:firefox && yarn postbuild:firefox
scripts.build:op: yarn clean && NODE_ENV=production yarn prod:css && yarn prebuild:opera && yarn prod:parcel:opera && yarn postbuild:opera
scripts.prebuild:firefox: move-file src/manifest.json src/manifest-chrome.json && move-file src/manifest-firefox.json src/manifest.json && move-file src/js/utils/misc/mp3.ts src/js/utils/misc/mp3-chrome.ts && move-file src/js/utils/misc/mp3-firefox.ts src/js/utils/misc/mp3.ts
scripts.postbuild:firefox: move-file src/manifest.json src/manifest-firefox.json && move-file src/manifest-chrome.json src/manifest.json && move-file src/js/utils/misc/mp3.ts src/js/utils/misc/mp3-firefox.ts && move-file src/js/utils/misc/mp3-chrome.ts src/js/utils/misc/mp3.ts
scripts.prebuild:opera: move-file src/manifest.json src/manifest-chrome.json && move-file src/manifest-opera.json src/manifest.json
scripts.postbuild:opera: move-file src/manifest.json src/manifest-opera.json && move-file src/manifest-chrome.json src/manifest.json
